channel.title: Forensics on Hello World!
channel.description: Recent content in Forensics on Hello World!

item.title: NoobCTF0x1 | Forensics *Writeups*
item.description: Can You Hear Me !!! 50pts While performing Man in the Middle attack, I got a secret message from a scientist which can save the world from COVID-19. But unfortunatly I am not able to hear that. I believe that someone with good knowledge of some tools can get the secret message. Note: Online tools also works. Link: https://mega.nz/file/xdxHiQbb#vK91LAP9JjVKxQnMp6e_J1x7-IOIiqbST-htEAmdQWo Replace spaces with _ At this challenge we were given the audio file Challenge.
